description:
Luffy is at the end of the line - the only thing that can save him now is true friendship. But in a place like Impel Down can true friendship be found?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dachi Dakara: Bon Clay Kesshi no Kyuushutsukou
For His Friend! Bon Clay Goes to the Deadly Rescue!
Parce que c’est mon ami... Bonclay part à la rescousse !
Потому что мы друзья! Бон Клэй спешит на помощь!
友達[ダチ]だから ボン・クレー決死の救出行
